page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content: My activities during the day are as follows...my alarm clock goes off at 7.00. I turn it off and go back to sleep. At 7.30 mu Mum brings me a cup of tea to wake me up. I then go downstairs and eat my breakfast. When I have eaten I get my schhol clothes ready and go and wash. Soon my friends call for me and together we go to school. We leave our house at about 8.30. Firstly I take my younger Sister to the First School. Then my friends and I take their sisters to the other First School. After this we head towards or school-The Middle School. After a day at school I play with a few of my friends. At 20.00 I would have my tea after which I would play till 21.00. After a cup of coffee I would wash and go to bed. That is what happens nearly every school day.
